title: Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project not always available
description:
Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)

When selecting both projects P1 and P2, the option to open/close a project is not always available.
OB: When selecting both projects P1 and P2, the option to open/close a project is not available.
EB: The option to open/close a project should be available when selecting both projects P1 and P2.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:

1. Create two projects: P1 and P2.
2. Select project P2 and close it.
